source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Twisted Appendage

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 629,424 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 290,333.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.
